snippet: Britain’s biggest supermarket group said its results had been eroded by an accounting scandal and by efforts to improve its profitability in the country.
abstract: British supermarket giant Tesco lowers expectations for full-year profit, sending shares down as much as 14 percent. .
lead_paragraph: Britain’s biggest supermarket group said its results had been eroded by an accounting scandal and by efforts to improve its profitability in the country.

headline.print_headline: Tesco Supermarket Group Says Full-Year Profits Will Be Down
